import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faUser,faUsers,faShoppingCart} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import {Collapse, Navbar,NavbarBrand,NavbarToggler,Nav} from 'reactstrap' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' // Nouveau Client function Header(){ const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) const toggle = () => setIsOpen(!isOpen); return (
Cart {this.getAmountCart() > 0 && "(" + this.getAmountCart() + ")"}
) } export default Header;
